message: This is funny, even if it makes a mockery of a real issue...

This is great news for Tesla. As the EV market becomes real with real competition, what they are doing is validated. GM is notorious for producing cars that produce good bullet points, but drive poorly and break down early (or has something changed recently?), a nice competitor to have. The Volt and Bolt are really ugly, and I can't figure out what I'm supposed to do once I'm out of power away from home.

You must not live in Houston because 5min delay on the freeway can lead to an hour of traffic. You're completely right that bills can wait, however I don't put myself in financial situations. I'd rather use my degree, that I paid for & help sick people get better. What if someone was going into labor? What if someone was rushing to the hospital to spend the last minutes their loved ones have on earth? What if an ambulance got stuck in that traffic? What if a cop was trying to get to a call and stop a robbery? This world runs by people doing their job, not by sitting in traffic that was cause by a non-emergency!

Hitler got in as a """"Nationalist"""". All despots have, and then when they want to conquer the world it's in the name of """"making our country great again"""". History is replete with Trumps. None of the past """"Globalist Presidents"""" (including Reagan) since Hoover have rejected our nations sovereignty, and I find it ironic that the person you expect to lead us past the corporate-political institution is a corporate institution unto himself. The only reason NAFTA works is rich people like Trump, who have taken their manufacturing need and shipped it off to Mexico or China. Remeber his nationalism next time you put on his shirt or hat.

Nice recitation of Fox news talking points. Have you travelled to Europe and actually talked to foreign people? I travelled to Europe 10 times between 2001-2007, and George Bush was considered a Nazi, much like his father and grandfather. I see no evidence of the Constitution being shredded for Shiria Law. Sharia Law is not very common in the Muslim World, much less in America. That would be like saying, """"America Lynches Black folks"""" based on looking at the Klan in the segregation days. Your whole construct is based on fallacy, therefore you are an Idiot.
